filters_applied: Low severity: keep only if mapped to vulnerability type

findings.description:
Reentrancy in EtherStore.withdrawFunds(uint256) (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_015.sol#12-20):
	External calls:
	- (send,None) = msg.sender.call{value: _weiToWithdraw}() (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_015.sol#14)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- balances[msg.sender] -= _weiToWithdraw (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_015.sol#18)
	EtherStore.balances (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_015.sol#6) can be used in cross function reentrancies:
	- EtherStore.balances (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_015.sol#6)
	- EtherStore.deposit() (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_015.sol#8-10)
	- EtherStore.withdrawFunds(uint256) (samples/ds/tier3/contracts/ds_t3_015.sol#12-20)
